description: {8The sounds of gears whirring and pistons releasing pressure fills the room
as magitek units of all sorts move about the room in various stages of testing
for use by the army.  A single man in vectorian garb covered in grease stands
in the center of the room admiring his work.{x
90930.name: {MM{magitek {MA{mrmor {MD{mistribution{x

description: {8This is the bottom level of the bunker and the heart of its operation.  The
sound of mechanical equipment moving air drones in the background through
the rock.  Doors stand closed at several locations around the hall and the
sound of voices can be heard drifing on the breeze from all quarters.{x
90906.name: {MF{mirst {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8This is a large stone chamber with saturated with the smell of smoke
and hot metal.  Racks line the walls holding up an assortment of armor
and other combat equipment.  The forge itself is in the back of the room
against the south wall.  A large well muscled man stands at the anvil
pounding it with a huge hammer.{x
90928.name: {MT{mhe {MV{mectorian {WA{wr{Wm{wo{Wr {MF{morge{x

description: {8The sound of hammers falling on metal dominates this level of the
bunker.  The floor is worn smooth from many years of foot traffic
to and from the supply departments that have their spaces here.
A slight chemical smell wafts through the air born on a slight
breeze that makes its way through the tunnel.{x
90913.name: {MS{mecond {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8The sound of hammers falling on metal dominates this level of the
bunker.  The floor is worn smooth from many years of foot traffic
to and from the supply departments that have their spaces here.
A slight chemical smell wafts through the air born on a slight
breeze that makes its way through the tunnel.{x
90921.name: {MS{mecond {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8This walls of the room are lined with torture impliments complete
with blood stains and other signs of use.  The center of the room
is dominated by a large wooden table surrounded by chairs.  Makou
lamps burn low around the room casting a sinister glow across the
facility.{x
90946.name: {MI{mnterrogation {MF{macility{x

description: {8This is the bottom level of the bunker and the heart of its operation.  The
sound of mechanical equipment moving air drones in the background through
the rock.  Doors stand closed at several locations around the hall and the
sound of voices can be heard drifing on the breeze from all quarters.{x
90909.name: {MF{mirst {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8This hallway is ornately decorated with several colorful tapestries
dedicated to the glory of lord Kefka and the Vectorian Empire.  The
floor is clean and covered in a plush carpeting that extends from wall
to wall.  Large heavy wooden doors Lead to the north and south, and
another in the end of the hallway to the west.  A sign over the door
on the north wall reads "{MX{meptimus{8".{x
90959.name: {MH{mallway {8in the {MB{munker{x

description: {8The sound of hammers falling on metal dominates this level of the
bunker.  The floor is worn smooth from many years of foot traffic
to and from the supply departments that have their spaces here.
A slight chemical smell wafts through the air born on a slight
breeze that makes its way through the tunnel.{x
90916.name: {MS{mecond {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8This i a large room full of various pieces collected from campaigns
throughout the empire's history.  Relics of power and wealth litter
the ground  and racks along the walls in an almost careless way.  In
the west wall is set a large vault full of spare things that members
of the army have donated for the use of their fellows.{x
90978.name: {MV{mectorian {MV{mault {8of {YR{yi{Yc{yh{Ye{ys{x

description: {8This is the bottom level of the bunker and the heart of its operation.  The
sound of mechanical equipment moving air drones in the background through
the rock.  Doors stand closed at several locations around the hall and the
sound of voices can be heard drifing on the breeze from all quarters.{x
90908.name: {MF{mirst {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8This is a large stone chamber cut out of the rock with pillars
here and there to support the ceiling.  Splashes of {Rb{rlood {8stain
the stone here and there from particularly violent sparring
sessions.  Racks of practice weapons line the walls of the
chamber offering a variety of {Rk{ri{Rl{rl{Ri{rn{Rg {8tools.  A large beast of
a man in full {Mv{mectorian {8plate armor stands here scowling at
sparring recruits and occasionally berating them for their
mistakes.{x
90900.name: {MT{mhe {RS{rp{Ra{rr{Rr{ri{Rn{rg {MC{mhamber{x

description: {8This is a simply decorated room with little furniture.  A simple
wooden bed rests against one wall with a dresser opposite it.  Old
but still comfortable carpeting covers the stone floor from wall to
wall.  A single makou lamp hangs near the door casting just enough
light about the room to make it cozy.{x
90951.name: {MB{marracks {MR{moom {8-{R1{8-{x

description: {8This is the bottom level of the bunker and the heart of its operation.  The
sound of mechanical equipment moving air drones in the background through
the rock.  Doors stand closed at several locations around the hall and the
sound of voices can be heard drifing on the breeze from all quarters.{x
90910.name: {MF{mirst {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8This room is large and well decorated.  Tapestries hang from the
walls to stop echoing of voices.  A pair of couches sit in one
corner to offer a place to relax.  A door to the west has a sign
over it that reads "Janitorial Services".  The Southeast corner
of the room is taken up by a large desk with a man sitting behind
it reading quietly.{x
90947.name: {ME{mntrance {8to the {MB{marracks{x

description: {8A long but narrow space carved out of the rock is lined on both
sides by deep shelves loaded to the fronts with jars and pots
of various things.  A hunch backed little man wearing patched
together pieces of old uniforms moves between the shelves taking
notes in a small black covered book.{x
90933.name: {MT{mhe {YA{ylchemist {MS{mtorage {ML{mocker{x

description: {8Bins line the walls, filled with assorted cogs, bits, and pieces
{8used in the construction of Mecha Units of assorted purpose and
{8designation.  A long work table stands in the center of the room,
{8filled with an array of tools to slam, screw, or otherwise slam
{8together into working models.  A large work order sheet is attached to
{8the wall, demanding notice but otherwise ignored by the workers
{8bustling inside. {x
90973.name: {MM{mecha {MM{models{x

description: {8This is a simply decorated room with little furniture.  A simple
wooden bed rests against one wall with a dresser opposite it.  Old
but still comfortable carpeting covers the stone floor from wall to
wall.  A single makou lamp hangs near the door casting just enough
light about the room to make it cozy.{x
90952.name: {MB{marracks {MR{moom {8-{R2{8-{x

description: {DIf you find yourself in this room, you are in a PET LOAD ROOM.
Please recall immediately!  {x
90979.name: Vectorian Pet Load Room

description: {8The back of this chamber is taken up by a large brick forge and bellows
unit.  Coal glows red hot within the belly of the forge.  The walls are
lined with racks for an assortment of weaponry.  Near the forge is a
large anvil where a man works a piece of steel with his huge hammer.{x
90926.name: {MT{mhe {MV{mectorian {RW{reapon {MF{morge{x

90976.name: BEGINNING OF MAZE

description: {8The sound of hammers falling on metal dominates this level of the
bunker.  The floor is worn smooth from many years of foot traffic
to and from the supply departments that have their spaces here.
A slight chemical smell wafts through the air born on a slight
breeze that makes its way through the tunnel.{x
90917.name: {MS{mecond {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8Enchantment lies think in this vertical shaft.  The walls are made
up of the living crystal magicite to cloak users of the tunnel from
magical detection.  The green glow from the walls is bright here from
the sheer quantity of the substance.  From above can be heard the
sounds of a busy city.{x
90972.name: {MA M{magicite {MT{munnel{x

description: {8Makou lanterns turned down low light the hallway around the bunker.  The
sound of steel clashing fills the air along with the smell of unwashed
bodies.  Doors at different parts of the hallway lead to different
compartments of the bunker and all stand closed.{x
90940.name: {MT{mhird {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8The walls of this chamber are lined with machines and panels.  Lights
come on and off on the panels as a feel of wildly powerful magic fluctuates
within the room.  What apears to be a living person in generic combat armor
stands in the middle of the room motionless awaiting attack.  His form
flickers every so often, the only thing that shows that he is not real.{x
90966.name: {RC{rombat {MT{mraining {MF{macility{x

description: {8This is a large stone chamber lined with cabinets with locked
glass doors.  Gold label plates adorn the top of each cabinet
indication the contents of each cabinet.  A man in a clean
pressed vectorian uniform stands behind a counter keeping an
eye on the stores and distributing goods.{x
90929.name: {MM{magitek {YA{ylchemical {MS{mupplies{x

description: {8Similar to the chamber to the west, this chamber has been carved from
the stone and contains several alcoves in the walls with stone arches
over the top of portals shimmering magically in the air.  The ceiling
is a dome and a single pillar three feet wide extends from the top to
the bottom.{x
90924.name: {8T{wr{8a{wn{8s{wp{8o{wr{8t{wa{8t{wi{8o{wn{8 M{wa{8t{wr{8i{wx{x

description: {8This is a simply decorated room with little furniture.  A simple
wooden bed rests against one wall with a dresser opposite it.  Old
but still comfortable carpeting covers the stone floor from wall to
wall.  A single makou lamp hangs near the door casting just enough
light about the room to make it cozy.{x
90954.name: {MB{marracks {MR{moom {8-{R4{8-{x

description: {8The hallway here is decorated in tapestries and paintings of previous
leaders within the Vectorian Empire.  Makou lamps burn along the walls
keeping the hallway well lit to show off the opulence of the area. Large
wooden doors are set into the north and south walls of the hall.  A sign
over the one to the north reads "{MA{mrcartier{8" and to the south "{MG{mlauss{8".{x
90958.name: {MH{mallway {8in the {MB{munker{x

description: {8Makou lanterns turned down low light the hallway around the bunker.  The
sound of steel clashing fills the air along with the smell of unwashed
bodies.  Doors at different parts of the hallway lead to different
compartments of the bunker and all stand closed.{x
90939.name: {MT{mhird {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8The walls of this chamber are lined with machines and panels.  Lights

90934.name: {MT{mhird {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8The hallway bends to the west here as the level of decoration picks
up.  Tapestries hang from the walls depicting battles and heros of the
empire.  Several doors can be seen further down the hallway to the west.
A giant magitek armor stands here guarding the area from unwanted
visitors.{x
90957.name: {ME{mntrance {8to the {ML{meader {MO{mffices{x

description: {8The unforgettable moment of setting foot into this large
{8medieval chamber, one can never ignore the aura of dismay.
{8Walls are as high as titans, books and scrolls scattered
{8everywhere across the floor and tables. Weapons of war
{8being decorated in glass closets unpolished as it preserves
{8the blood stains of the enemies who stand before the
{MV{mectorian {ME{mmpire{8. There are three hidden vaults in
{8this chamber, invisible to the eyes of the living, not the
{8undead. It contains blueprints to every {MM{magitek {MT{mechnology
{mwithin the {ME{mmpire{8 and plans for future prospects to come.
{8The chamber itself has been cursed by Xeptimus, intruders
{8are easily spotted and caught. They shall be tortured and
{8slain without mercy. In the middle of the room is a rug
{8with the symbol of the {MV{mectorian {ME{mmpire {8and a portrait
{8of {ML{mord {MK{mefka {8fitted into the glass wall.{x
90962.name: {MX{meptimus' {MO{mffice{x

description: {8Makou lanterns turned down low light the hallway around the bunker.  The
sound of steel clashing fills the air along with the smell of unwashed
bodies.  Doors at different parts of the hallway lead to different
compartments of the bunker and all stand closed.{x
90944.name: {MT{mhird {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8Enchantment lies think in this vertical shaft.  The walls are made
up of the living crystal magicite to cloak users of the tunnel from
magical detection.  The green glow from the walls is bright here from
the sheer quantity of the substance.  From above can be heard the
sounds of a busy city.{x
90971.name: {MA M{magicite {MT{munnel{x

description: {8Here the cave system comes to an end.  Heavy steel doors bar the
way forward and two large Magitek Armor units block access.  The
magicite glow is stronger here as the magicite itself is more
abundant this deep in the planet.  The faint sounds of swords
clashing can be heard coming from beyond the giant doors.{x
90967.name: {ME{mntrance {8to the {MB{munker{x

description: {8Makou lanterns turned down low light the hallway around the bunker.  The
sound of steel clashing fills the air along with the smell of unwashed
bodies.  Doors at different parts of the hallway lead to different
compartments of the bunker and all stand closed.{x
90942.name: {MT{mhird {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8As one step into the off{mi{8ce, it fe{me{8ls very much like he has
{8walked into another dimen{msio{8n. {mThe {8room is engulfed in dusk
{8Like a black hole, complet{me{8l{my {ms{8i{ml{8ent with an aura of death.
{8Losing two senses, {mone gains despair and {8forlorn staying in
{8the room. However, t{mh{8i{ms {8i{ms the roo{8m {mt{mh{8a{mt {8Arcartier, General
{8of Vector's National {mD{8e{mf{8en{ms{8e d{mo{8e{ms {8h{mi{8s  planning for all war
{8activities. Torments {mof o{8n{me{8s m{mi{8n{md i{8s {ma{8ble to bring out some
{8unimaginable thought{ms of de{8s{mp{8e{mr{8a{mte{8n{mess {8that has brought him
{8and his army to nume{mr{8o{mu{8s v{mi{8c{mt{8o{mr{8i{me{8s{m. A{8t the side of his desk
{8lies a big metal vau{ml{8t t{mh{8a{mt h{8o{ml{8d{ms a{8l{ml h{8is spare body parts.
{8Made of the same mat{me{8r{mia{8l  a{ms t{8h{me {8M{mag{8i{mt{8ek Armors, lucky for
{8him, his magicite is {mno{8n{me o{8t{mh{8e{mr {8th{ma{8n {mK{8irin's that is bestow
{8with the ability to r{me{8g{menerate spari{8n{mg{8  him with the hassle
{8of feeding himself {mwith magicites. Hang o{8n  the wall behind

90960.name: {MA{mrcartier's {MO{mffice{x

description: Suicide here
90927.name: Magitek Armor room

description: {8This is a small stone walled room furnished with a desk and a
chair and not much else.  A thin coating of dust covers everything
and the air smells slightly stale.  It apears that this room has
not been used in quite some time.{x
90963.name: {MA V{macant {MO{mffice{x

description: {8This is a simply decorated room with little furniture.  A simple
wooden bed rests against one wall with a dresser opposite it.  Old
but still comfortable carpeting covers the stone floor from wall to
wall.  A single makou lamp hangs near the door casting just enough
light about the room to make it cozy.{x
90953.name: {MB{marracks {MR{moom {8-{R3{8-{x

description: {8Enchantment lies thick in these tunnels.  Every inch looks the same
as you pass through virtually identical intersections.  Greenish crystal
makes up the construction of all of the visible surfaces.  The walls
pulse with a magical green glow that lights the path.{x
90970.name: {MA M{magicite {MT{munnel{x

description: {8Makou lanterns turned down low light the hallway around the bunker.  The
sound of steel clashing fills the air along with the smell of unwashed
bodies.  Doors at different parts of the hallway lead to different
compartments of the bunker and all stand closed.{x
90941.name: {MT{mhird {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8The hallway here takes a bend to the east as it goes deeper into the
sleeping quarters within the bunker.  Makou lamps are mounted to the
walls every so often to provide light in the relative darkness of the
underground facility.  Carpeting covers the stone floor giving the area
a comfortable feel.{x
90948.name: {MH{mallway {8in the {MB{marracks{x

description: {8This is a large chamber cut into the rock.  The walls have stone alcoves
cut into the walls with shimmering portals set into them.  Cut into the
rock of the arches are the names of the locations the portals lead to.
An empty archway to the east leads to what apears to be another similar
chamber.{x
90923.name: {8T{wr{8a{wn{8s{wp{8o{wr{8t{wa{8t{wi{8o{wn{8 M{wa{8t{wr{8i{wx{x

description: {8The hallway ends here with a door marked -{R5{8-.  The stone walls apear
to be recently cleaned and well cared for.  Makou lamps line the walls
to light the way.  To the north and south are wooden doors over which
are the numbers -{R3{8- and -{R4{8- {8respectively.{x
90950.name: {MH{mallway {8in the {MB{marracks{x

description: {8This is a large chamber hollowed out from the rock.  The domed ceiling
designed to improve acoustics in the room so all might hear the speaker.
Chairs are set in lines accross the room, enough to seat 50 people at
a time.  A stage at the front of the room is complete with a podium and
a few chairs.  A large tapestry of Lord Kefka covers the west wall in
its entirety.{x
90945.name: {MM{meeting {MC{mhamber{x

description: {8The sound of hammers falling on metal dominates this level of the
bunker.  The floor is worn smooth from many years of foot traffic
to and from the supply departments that have their spaces here.
A slight chemical smell wafts through the air born on a slight
breeze that makes its way through the tunnel.{x
90914.name: {MS{mecond {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8The hallway here stretches to the east and west into the distance. Doors
line the walls with numbers printed over them.  To the north is a -{R1{8-, and
the south a -{R2{8-.  worn carpeting is stretched over the stone floor of the
hall.  Makou lamps are set into the walls at regular intervals keeping the
hallway well lit.{x
90949.name: {MH{mallway {8in the {MB{marracks{x

description: {8A circular chamber within the stone of the bunker, it houses many
tables and shelves containing various bottles and pieces of alchemical
equipment.  Vials bubble of small tongues of makou fueled fire on
several of the work benches.  A tall skinny man in an old looking
vectorian uniform wanders around the room mumbling to himself
occasionally.{x
90932.name: {MT{mhe {YA{ylchemist {ML{maboratory{x

description: {8This is plain stone chamber, lit on all four sides by makou
torches burning low.  The only thing in the room is a large
metal locker set into the south wall with a heavy lock holding
the doors shut.  It looks to contain something important.{x

90936.name: {MT{mhird {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8Here is a large room circular in shape, racks of weapons line the
walls as well as straw training dummies set on wooden skeletons.  The
room itself is bright, illuminated by a large fire burning in the
center.  All around are soldiers training to be their very best.  {x

to and from the supply departments that have their spaces here.
A slight chemical smell wafts through the air born on a slight
breeze that makes its way through the tunnel.{x
90919.name: {MS{mecond {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8The sound of hammers falling on metal dominates this level of the
bunker.  The floor is worn smooth from many years of foot traffic
to and from the supply departments that have their spaces here.
A slight chemical smell wafts through the air born on a slight
breeze that makes its way through the tunnel.{x
90922.name: {MS{mecond {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8The sound of hammers falling on metal dominates this level of the
bunker.  The floor is worn smooth from many years of foot traffic
to and from the supply departments that have their spaces here.
A slight chemical smell wafts through the air born on a slight
breeze that makes its way through the tunnel.{x
90912.name: {MS{mecond {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8The walls here are covered in worn tapestries displaying the glories
of battle for the Magitek Army.  The steel ceiling gleams with the
flickering of the torchlight.  The center of the room is dominated
by a large locker that has been bolted to the floor.  A lock very
similar to the one on the door is set into the metal of this box.
90974.name: MOUNT LOADING ROOM

description: {x
{8This is the most fortified room in the bunker.  The walls are lined
{8with steel and stone several feet thick.  To the north is a giant metal
{8door on oiled hinges the size of a strong man's leg.  The surface of
{8the door shimmers with enchantments allowing those in the army passage
{8through.  The center of the room is taken up by a small natural hot
{8spring.  In one corner a stockpile of food and drinks sits behind a
{8desk with a man in Vectorian uniform selling to the troops.{x
90918.name: {MT{mhe {MH{meart of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8Makou lanterns turned down low light the hallway around the bunker.  The
sound of steel clashing fills the air along with the smell of unwashed
bodies.  Doors at different parts of the hallway lead to different
compartments of the bunker and all stand closed.{x
90956.name: {MH{mallway {8in the {MB{munker{x

description: {8This is the bottom level of the bunker and the heart of its operation.  The
sound of mechanical equipment moving air drones in the background through
the rock.  Doors stand closed at several locations around the hall and the
sound of voices can be heard drifing on the breeze from all quarters.{x
90903.name: {MF{mirst {MF{mloor {8of the {MB{munker{x

description: {8This office is well lit and fairly large. Upon the floor
{8in the entry way is an elaborate rug, making a pathway
{8of sorts to the front of a large oak desk. The desk is
{8dark in color and upon it stands a strange sort of lamp
{8glowing with a green tint. Behind the desk sits a large
{8comfortable looking chair. The seat worn with a bit with
{8time but not losing its appearance of elegance. Upon the
{8walls are weapons and shields of all sorts appearing to
{8be hung as trophies. Two torches remain lit on either
{8side of the room.{x
90961.name: {M{mGlauss' {MO{mffice

description:
{mIt stands about 8 feet and appears like an overgrown human man, except this man
{mis the color of steel and iron and stands well over two feet taller than an average
{mhuman. A metal plate rivetted across his chest reads 'K-462'. It is a device
{mknown as Magitek Armor, but unlike its older brothers which appear as giant machines
{mridden by soldiers, there are none, just the machine. As it stands guard here
{mat the gate, it appears to be motionless.{x
90998.room_name: {mA man made of {yiron{m and {Wsteel{m, standing about 8 feet tall stands here.{x
90998.name: {MM{magitek {RM{rechanical {MA{mrmor {YM{yodel {CK{c-{C462{x~
90998.keywords: Magitek Armor Vectorian Base Guard One Model K-462~

F vul F
M exall 90911 1~
M grall 90931 100~

description:
{8A short man in vectorian uniform but wearing no armor.  The supply officer
has hair slicked back from his face and a perpetual grin twists his lips.
A strong chemical smell surrounds this man as he moves between shelves
checking on his supplies.  The insignia on his collar is three red stripes.{x
90900.name: {8a {MM{magitek {MS{mupply {MO{mfficer {8[{R\\\{8]{w{x~
90900.keywords: potion supply magitek officer first class~

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 90915 100~

description:
{8This is a tall man wearing a short sleeved cotton shirt with a thick
leather apron falling almost to the floor in front of him.  This thickly
muscled arms move his hammer as though it cost no effort.  Short cropped
black hair tops his head and a beard extends down over the top of his
apron.{x
90901.name: {8a {MV{mectorian {RW{reapon {MS{mmith{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 90916 100~

description:
{8A tall but skinny man wearing a slightly shabby vectorian uniform
with many stains from chemicals and other spills of unknown origin.
This second class supply officer apears to be slightly mad as he
mumbles to himself.  The insignia on his collar is two red bars.{x
90902.name: {8a {MM{magitek {MS{mupply {MO{mfficer {8[{R\\{8]{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
This man wears a Vectorian issue jump suit and is covered from head
to toe in grease.  He wears a toolbelt and has a wrench in his hand. 
His only job is here working on the mechanical armors.
90903.name: {8a {%M{x{5agitek {8Armor {%E{5ngineer{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 90917 100~

description:
{*An engineered beast stands here, built in the design of the original Magitek
Armor that has horrified the realms with its devistating magical attacks, except
this creature of metal is about half the size and looks like it could not pose
a threat.{x
90904.room_name: {8a mechanical beast stands here at attention.{x
90904.name: {8an {YA{ydvanced {%M{x{5agicite {%B{5east{x~

F for AHZ
F par ACDEFGHIJKPQUVX

description: A sparring partner created by the training matrix before you.
90905.name: {8a {YA{ydvanced {%T{5raining {8dummy{x~

description: A sparring partner created by the training matrix before you.
90906.name: {8a {%T{5raining {8Dummy{x~

description:
{DLittle more than an optical observation and scouting unit, the
D-R01D was constructed with utilitarian goals in mind.  Whirling
blades keep the mechanation aloft, allowing it to fly and float about
nearly soundlessly.  Clusters of optical lenses stud the body of the
mecha, allowing it to record and enhance images in nearly all
spectrums of light.  The D-R01D was designed for speed and stealth, so
there is relatively minor damage dealing applications applied to this
model.  {x
90907.name: {MD{D-{mR0{M1{DD{x~
subroutines: F vul I

This man wears a Vectorian issue jump suit and is covered from head
to toe in grease.  He wears a toolbelt and has a wrench in his hand. 
His only job is here working on the mechanical armors.
90908.name: {8a {%M{x{5agitek {8Armor {%E{5ngineer{x~
subroutines:

F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
{8This man wears a torn and tattered rag of what was once a vectorian
uniform.  His back is hunched and malformed and one arm apears longer
than the other.  He hobbles about the small room muttering angrily to
himself constantly.  The device on his collar is a single red bar.{x
90909.name: {8a {MM{magitek {MS{mupply {MO{mfficer {8[{R\{8]{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
An officer in the Magitek Army, this man has been stationed within
the stronghold to assist with training in all skills.  He looks gruff
and maybe a bit disgruntled.  This man has surely seen many battles.
90910.name: {8The {%C{5ombat {%M{5aster{x~

description:
A short man in long flowing robes.  He stands here awaiting troops
in need of his healing services.
90912.name: {8A {%V{5ectorian {%P{5riest{x~
subroutines: M grall 90919 100~

description:
{8A tall mountain of a man in heavy plate armor and holding a long magicite
sword in one hand stands here surveying the pathetic excuses for warriors
he has been set to train.  Only the upper half of his scarred face is 
visible through the gap in his helmet.  The vectorian army symbol is
engraved into his chestplate.{8
90913.name: {8a {MV{mectorian {MC{maptain{x~
subroutines:
F for H
M act 90900 slaps you~

description:
This magitek armor stands ready facing the stairs prepared for attack.
It's long mechanical arms are formed into large metalic clubs that
are fixed with short spikes.
90914.name: {8A {CH{ceavily {CA{crmored {MM{magitek {MU{mnit{x~
subroutines:
M grall 90968 100~
M grall 90922 100~

description:
This archmage apears old but his eyes sparkle with power.  He watches over the
stairs carefully attempting to detect any intrusion be it magical or mundane.
His long purple robes fall to the floor and brush the ground next to his feet.
90915.room_name: {8The {MM{magitek {BG{buardian {BA{brc{Chm{bag{Be{x is here watching over the stronghold.

paper he keeps in his pocket.{x

description:

device of rank on the collar of his immaculate shirt.  He sits
behind the reception desk casually but alert to the needs of
the residents.  He holds a book written in an ancient language.
Perhaps there is more to him than is visible.{x
